summary.overview: This batch job loads pending authorization data into the IMS PAUTDB database by processing root and child segment records from sequential input files. The job establishes hierarchical relationships between parent authorization summaries and their associated detail records in the Card Demo application database.
business_functions: Read pending authorization summary records from root segment input file
Insert authorization summary data as root segments into PAUTDB database
Read pending authorization detail records from child segment input file
Establish parent-child relationships between summary and detail records
Insert authorization detail data as child segments under corresponding root segments
Validate data integrity during database loading process
Handle database operation errors and provide appropriate error reporting

LOADPADB.JCL.program_overview: Loads pending authorization data into IMS database by reading sequential files and inserting hierarchical segments
